thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 9 of 122
thread.title: Paul Fitzpatrick

author: Paul Fitzpatrick
title: Paul Fitzpatrick
text:
Mitch my travel manager was profession and creative. I needed to route away from USA for visa reasons and he selected the best route into San Jose. I requested an accommodation change and this was dealt with speedily and to a satisfactory result.
My flight was on time and well planned. Mitch contacted me a few times to ensure that my plans were still as planned.
I flew business class and felt that the overall price gave me value for money.
I would recommend Dial-A-Flight to my business contacts again..
